channel.title: Led_string_ws2811 edits
channel.description:
I'm very noob-y at line coding, and I have a project I'm working on where I'd like to utilize the led_string_ws2811.axp patch...
I've tested the default script and I love it, but I'm wondering if I can have a static blue color that pulses to an integer input. No counting up or changing color based on if/else arguments, but just one static rgb value that changes intensity depending on the input.
I think this could be super easy to do, but as I'm testing changes to the code, I'm not getting much progress, and am getting rather confused. I think I might be missing something important.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Led_string_ws2811 edits
item.dc:creator: @Escarbanzo Eric Lorenz

@Escarbanzo wrote:

I'm very noob-y at line coding, and I have a project I'm working on where I'd like to utilize the led_string_ws2811.axp patch...

I've tested the default script and I love it, but I'm wondering if I can have a static blue color that pulses to an integer input. No counting up or changing color based on if/else arguments, but just one static rgb value that changes intensity depending on the input.

I think this could be super easy to do, but as I'm testing changes to the code, I'm not getting much progress, and am getting rather confused. I think I might be missing something important.
